I try to make ground with texture I want.
I use texture like this
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1fc0awHy03Bz2Mdypui0lli9OFH5BFxSA

I use heightmap and write
```
#!sdf
    <visual name="visual">
        <cast_shadows>false</cast_shadows>
        <geometry>
          <heightmap>
           <uri>model://ground/materials/heightmaps/heightmap.png</uri>
           <size>3000 2000 30</size>
          </heightmap>
        </geometry>
        <material>
          <script>
            <uri>model://ground/materials/scripts</uri>
            <uri>model://ground/materials/textures</uri>
            <name>vrc/ground</name>
          </script>
        </material>
      </visual>
```
script of material is
```
#!sdf
material vrc/ground
{
	technique
	{
		pass
		{
			ambient 0.5 0.5 0.5 1.0
			diffuse 0.5 0.5 0.5 1.0
			specular 0.9 0.9 0.9 1.0 12.5

			texture_unit
			{
				texture texture.png
				filtering anistropic
				max_anisotropy 16
				scale 0.1 0.1
			}
		}
	}
}
```
result is absolutely different color
